title: Return Policy
text: Customers may return items within 30 days of purchase. A receipt or digital invoice is required. Refunds are issued to the original payment method. Items must be unused and in resalable condition.

title: Replacement Policy
text: Defective items are eligible for free replacement within 14 days. Customers must share photos of the defect. Replacement shipping is free of cost.

title: Shipping Information
text: Standard shipping takes 5–7 business days. Express shipping takes 1–2 days. Tracking information is provided via email after dispatch.

title: Cancellation Rules
text: Orders can be canceled within 2 hours of placement. After the order is processed, cancellation may not be possible.

title: Warranty Coverage
text: Most electronics come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty covering manufacturing defects, but not accidental damage or misuse.
